title: How to Create a Multi Boot USB Drive with Yumi

steps.headline: Download Yumi.
steps.description: This is the program that will be used to create this multi-boot flash drive.

steps.headline: Insert your flash drive in an open USB slot.
Open my computer.
steps.description: Once the explorer window is open, make sure you are able to see all of the available drives. Note the drive letter of the flash drive that you want to use.

steps.headline: Open Yumi.
steps.description: This will be where you placed it when downloaded.

steps.headline: Select the distribution from the list that you want
Download the selected distribution.
steps.description: Place the file into the same folder as Yumi .

steps.headline: Once downloaded click create to create the bootable flash drive.
Once completed you should now be able to select the USB drive on bootup to access the distributions.

tyn: A suitable flash drive. (Larger drive will allow more options)
text: Download Yumi. This is the program that will be used to create this multi-boot flash drive. Insert your flash drive in an open USB slot.  Open my computer. Once the explorer window is open, make sure you are able to see all of the available drives. Note the drive letter of the flash drive that you want to use. Open Yumi. This will be where you placed it when downloaded. Select your flash drives letter.  Select the distribution from the list that you want  Download the selected distribution. Place the file into the same folder as Yumi . Once downloaded click create to create the bootable flash drive.  Repeat for more distributions.  Once completed you should now be able to select the USB drive on bootup to access the distributions.
sentences: This is the program that will be used to create this multi-boot flash drive.
Insert your flash drive in an open USB slot.
Once the explorer window is open, make sure you are able to see all of the available drives.
Note the drive letter of the flash drive that you want to use.
This will be where you placed it when downloaded.
Select the distribution from the list that you want  Download the selected distribution.
Place the file into the same folder as Yumi .
Once downloaded click create to create the bootable flash drive.
Once completed you should now be able to select the USB drive on bootup to access the distributions.
